pin.title: Cast Your Vote
pin.subtitle: Enter your credentials to begin voting
pin.notEligible: You are not eligible to vote at this time

ballot.title: Your Ballot
ballot.subtitle: Select one candidate for each position

review.title: Review Your Selections

receipt.autoLogout: You will be logged out in {seconds} seconds

pinReset.title: Request PIN Reset
pinReset.subtitle: Enter your National ID to request a PIN reset. You will then choose how to verify your identity.
pinReset.error: Failed to submit PIN reset request. Please try again.
pinReset.statusPending: Your PIN reset request is pending. Complete verification via biometric or visit an IEBC office.
pinReset.statusApproved: Your PIN has been reset. You can now log in with your new PIN.
pinReset.statusNone: No pending PIN reset request found for this ID.
pinReset.chooseMethodSubtitle: Your reset request has been submitted. Choose how you would like to verify your identity.
pinReset.biometricDesc: Re-verify by scanning your national ID and completing a liveness check using your camera. Powered by Persona.
pinReset.inPersonDesc: Visit your nearest IEBC office to verify your identity in person.
pinReset.inPersonStep1: Bring your original national ID card
pinReset.inPersonStep2: An IEBC officer will verify your identity
pinReset.inPersonStep3: You will receive your new PIN on the spot
